rules_text:
{3}{G}{G}: Target land you control becomes an 8/8 green Elemental creature with trample. It's still a land.
Whenever a land you control deals combat damage to a player, put that many +1/+1 counters on Mystic of Unbridled Power.
flavor_text: [i]The power lies latent within the trees. His magic brings it to life.[/i]
